content: found via the wayback machine skill level easy **supplies ** coats® crème de la crème™ 6 balls 307 tan crochet hooks 6mm us j-10 and 4mm us g-6 yarn needle **gauges ** 11 sts = 4 12 row = 4 in single_crochet with 2 strands held together and 6mm hook 16 sts = 4 11 row = 4 in half_double_crochet with 4mm hook check your gauges use any size hooks to obtain the gauges
